title: "As you win more, the system will pair you against harder and harder opponents to force you to lose"
body:
So I've been told but I didn't believe it until my last game....where I was basically forced to lose with this (note my kill participation as I was desperately trying to get the team to work on winning).

http://imgur.com/BiMSV2L[img]

Normals, yes this type of matchmaking is fine.  Ranked, this should never ever happen.  Ranging from Silver 5 to Gold 2 and guess what team had the 3 Golds.  And my MMR is _normal_ for my Rank according to op.gg
